ovdesc.p: It holds the details of un authorized Transactions stored in ENTRY.HOLD (Both live and Fwd) and awaiting input from second user , pertaining to a single account.
Updated in the cob job REBUIL.AVAIL.FUNDS. It is being used to update the Available Balance of the account with un authorized transactions

desc.p: Id to ENTRY.HOLD/FWD.ENTRY.HOLD. Ids of FWD.ENTRY.HOLD are stored with '*F' succeeding the transaction's ID.
